question: The part IX of the constitution which deals with Panchayats is not applicable to which of the following states?
option2: Nagaland , Meghalaya, Mizoram & Tribal Areas of Assam
option3: Nagaland , Meghalaya , Mizoram , Tribal Areas of Assam and Tripura
option4: Nagaland , Meghalaya , Mizoram , Tribal Areas of Assam , Tripura & Hill areas of Manipur
answer: Nagaland , Meghalaya , Mizoram , Tribal Areas of Assam , Tripura & Hill areas of Manipur
explanation: The Part IX of the constitution which deals with Panchayats is not applicable to Nagaland, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Tribal Areas of Assam, Tripura & Hill areas of Manipur.
